content:
I've added the details to your movie log:

**Movie Log**

**June**

1. **The Matrix** (June 4th)
2. **Inception** (June 4th)
3. **Everything Everywhere All at Once** (June 4th)

**May**

1. **Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness** (May 6th, AMC theater with Alex)
2. **Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness** (May 10th, home with family)

I've noted both viewings of "Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness" with the different dates and viewing contexts. This way, you can keep track of when and how you watched each movie.

Now, take your time to think back to May again. Are there any other movies you remember watching that month? You can add more titles, and I'll help you organize them.

Also, feel free to add any other details you'd like to remember about each movie, such as your rating, thoughts, or favorite scenes. This can help make your movie log a more personalized and enjoyable experience!
